definitions.definition: The quality of having a bitter taste .
The quality of feeling bitter; acrimony , resentment ; the quality of exhibiting such feelings.
examples: She kept her bitterness about her mistreatment for the rest of her life.

definitions.definition: The quality of eliciting a bitter, humiliating or harsh feeling.
examples: Nothing could assuage the bitterness of their defeat.
The bitterness of the winter caught us all by surprise.

main_definition: The quality of having a bitter taste .
secondary_definitions: The quality of feeling bitter; acrimony , resentment ; the quality of exhibiting such feelings.
The quality of eliciting a bitter, humiliating or harsh feeling.
